mapper.select: SELECT snippet_id, user_id, folder_id, color_id, source_url, type, memo, created_at, updated_at, like_count, visibility FROM snippets WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND visibility = 1 ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT snippet_id, user_id, folder_id, color_id, source_url, type, memo, created_at, updated_at, like_count, visibility FROM snippets WHERE visibility = 1 ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT s.snippet_id, s.user_id, s.folder_id, s.color_id, s.source_url, s.type, s.memo, s.created_at, s.updated_at, s.like_count, s.visibility, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM likes l WHERE l.snippet_id = s.snippet_id) as actual_likes FROM snippets s WHERE s.visibility = 1 ORDER BY actual_likes DESC, s.snippet_id ASC
LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT snippet_id, user_id, folder_id, color_id, source_url, type, memo, created_at, updated_at, like_count, visibility FROM popular_snippets_view
LIMIT #{limit}
